mapper.select: select cr.cr_idx as cridx, cr.roomname as roomname, cr.person as personnum, cm.notreadmessage as notreadmessage from chat_member cm join tbl_chat_room cr on cm.fk_cr_idx = cr.cr_idx where cm.cm_status = 1 and cm.fk_member_idx = #{idx}

select m.idx as midx, cc.message as message, cc.time as chattime, cc.readcount as readcount, cc.realfilename as realfilename, cc.filesize as filesize, m.name as name, m.img as img from chat_content cc join tbl_chat_room cr on cr.cr_idx = cc.fk_cr_idx join tbl_member m on cc.fk_member_idx = m.idx where cr.cr_idx = #{cridx} order by cc.cc_idx
mapper.insert: insert into chat_content values(seq_chat_content.nextval, #{cridx}, #{idx}, #{message}, sysdate, 0, default, default, default)
mapper.update: update chat_member set notreadmessage = notreadmessage+1 where fk_cr_idx = #{cridx}
